Text: Very cool old game, just an FYI some games no longer work on newer systems, I had to retire this one and a few other,s SAD I KNOW
@RMJ13, I have 2 fairly new computers using windows 7 and have tested this without any problems, this is a 2004 game that still holds its own in graphics, no need to put away a gem like this.

I know I have 3 Desktop,s and a CRAPTOP

the game still works on my oldest rig.
